judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Stearns, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Hirt of the Superior Court.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Rudy, Appellant, v. McCloskey & Company.
Argued November 30, 1943.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Stearns, JJ.
John O. Arnold, of Arnold & Chaplin, with him Fleming & Lithe, for appellant.
John W. Kephart, with him Arthur O. Ddle, for appellee.
January 3, 1944:
